Key Match Events: Jorge Soler threw out a runner at the plate late
Chris Sale won his major league-leading 15th game with six crisp innings
Carlos Castro singled to center, Jeffers scored, Miranda to second
Olson doubled to center, Ozuna scored
Laureano singled to right, Olson scored, Laureano to second
Williams doubled to left, Murphy scored and Arcia scored
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game went into 10th inning before a decisive win
David Festa took the loss for the Twins
Chris Sale's 15th win leads the league
